Sentencas: Atomic scale simulations have been used to investigate the impact of co-doping (yttrium and gadolinium) and strain on oxygen diffusion and binding of dopant-vacancy clusters in ceria.
Titulo: Effect of strain on the oxygen diffusion in yttria and gadolinia co-doped ceria

Sentencas: Doped ceria in its relaxed or strained form is used as an electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cell applications.
Titulo: Effect of strain on the oxygen diffusion in yttria and gadolinia co-doped ceria

Sentencas: For unstrained co-doped ceria we calculate an activation energy for migration of 0.70-0.75 eV in the temperature range of 973-1873 K. Co-doping with yttrium and gadolinium only affected oxide ion diffusion to a small degree when compared to single doping.
Titulo: Effect of strain on the oxygen diffusion in yttria and gadolinia co-doped ceria

Sentencas: The diffusion coefficient was substantially increased by tensile strain while compressive strain caused a decrease.
Titulo: Effect of strain on the oxygen diffusion in yttria and gadolinia co-doped ceria

Sentencas: To gain further insight why tensile strain leads to higher diffusivity static simulations were employed.
Titulo: Effect of strain on the oxygen diffusion in yttria and gadolinia co-doped ceria

Sentencas: It is calculated that tensile strain reduces the binding energies of clusters between oxygen vacancies and trivalent dopant atoms while compressive strain leads to higher binding energies.
Titulo: Effect of strain on the oxygen diffusion in yttria and gadolinia co-doped ceria
Effect of strain on the oxygen diffusion in yttria and gadolinia co-doped ceria
Effect of strain on the oxygen diffusion in yttria and gadolinia co-doped ceria
